thread.title: Akshay Shah

author: Akshay Shah
title: Akshay Shah
text: My girlfriend bought a ticket to fly to the UK using Bravofly through skyscanner. Not only did they not send a confirmation email immediately after the flight was booked, when she checked the flight a week before there was no record of a scheduled flight at all. She tried to call them to find out what was going on, and of course there was no reply. She then had to buy another ticket last minute. This company is a JOKE - they will take your hard-earned money and not respond to anything once you chase them. Should be shut down.
